name: Oshiage Holiday Apartment
description:
The space
We are happy to welcome you to our apartment, located in the heart of Tokyo downtown. This is an authentic Japanese apartment with Tatami mattress room and sleeping on Japanese Futon, like Ryokan style.

Fully equipped and convienient kitchen will give you oportunity to feel like at home. Automatic bath tub. Separate toilet with heating seat and washlet.

Direct acces from both Narita and Haneda airports.

Easy access to most of Tokyo attractions.

10min walk from Oshiage Station,

7min walk from Tobu Hikifune Station,

8min walk from Heisei Hikifune Station.

Free internet access.
Air conditioning, 2 semi-double futon bed (for 2 person each), LCD 32 inch TV, full
kitchen, microwave, toster, electric pot, refrigerator, coffee maker, iron, hair dryer, washing machine, bathroom with a bath tub and shower, gas grill. Cooking utensils and linens provided.

Our apartment is locate
host_about: Would love to travel all over the world and meet and feel the different people and cultures.

name: Kero-kero house room 1
description:
We have been in airbnb since 2011 and it has given us many new opportunity to meet and learn everyday.
It is a private room with a toilet just beside the room.

We have now in airbnb experience.
If you are interested in making bento and gyoza please let us know so we can send you the link for booking.

Thank you very much.

The space
INTRO

ε(*´･･`)зﾞHey"ε(´･･`*)з

*TAKE NOTE*
Just a few Notes to inform.
From June 15 we have certified for home sharing.
New law have enforced in Japan for home sharing.
We are certified for Home sharing.
We hope people would come enjoy Japan and and to learn about Japanese culture.
Please let us know if you have questions.
We have also varieties of airbnb experience to do together.
Please let us know if you have interest in Gyoza making, Bento making, Jinbei making and Needle felting.
Sorry for mobile wiFi, recently we have proble
neighborhood_overview: We love Nishinippori because is nearer to Tokyo which we are fond of parks and more comfortable space.
host_about:
Love culture/foods/anime and to know about other countries people. 

We likes handmade.
Kei likes cooking (❀◕∇◕)爻(◕∇◕❀)

... felting, knitting, sewing, zakka.., coffee art (anything that is handmade)
Kotaro likes making pottery and origami!
✾“ヽ(*♥д♥*)ﾉ”✾
You can book us on airbnb experience for bento making, gyoza, needle felting and Japanese yukata/jinbei summer wear. from 0-3 years old available.
Let us know we can make the schedule for you during your stay.

Kotaro is IT software engineer. We both met in the same work place.
Kei now is busy with her crafts and Miya. 

We are a small family who enjoy outing a lot.
If you are interested in Japanese cooking, Origami, Felting, 
please let us know. 
we can arrange time to do together.. (FUN TIME) 

Our dream is to have our own guest house 
with our little hand craft cafe serving our homemade Japanese food
..taught by our mothers, grandmothers..

  ∧,,∧
(;`･ω･)  ｡･ﾟ･⌒) ﾁｬｰﾊﾝ作るよ!!
/   o━ヽﾆﾆﾌ))
しｰ-J

We created F.B/ (Hidden by Airbnb) for our kero kero house (guest only)..
feel free to add us with introduction!

We love natures/photos and everything that is cute (@^.^@)
AND to get to know us more, add us on LINE after your confirmation!
we will keep you update on Tokyo's weather/festival. 

Let us know!!
Hope to share and learn more!
Thanks for your interest and time looking at our page!

name: Classy room @Shinjuku, Takadanoba
description:
..*+;.*:' Popular room in Airbnb@Tokyo *;+:..*
=> 95% of guests wrote a positive review :)

Good location, modern designed private apartment,
along JR Yamanote line, the most useful train in Tokyo!
9min walk from Takadanobaba station (2stops from Shinjuku),
Many restaurants around the station!

The space
Walkable from Shinjuku station even if you miss the last train. With a classy designed building, you can enjoy a neo-Tokyo stay.

The house is 9 minutes from Takadanobaba station along Yamanote-line. From Takadanobaba, you can go to Shinjuku by 5 minutes, to Shibuya by 12 minutes!
Even if you miss the last train, you can go back from Shinjuku on foot. (There are so many attractive night spots like bars or restaurants in Shinjuku.)

Takadanobaba is really nice place to live. You can buy any groceries and also has many good restaurants. I usually eat out around there so if you want to know, please ask me!
<
host_about: I've been around center in Tokyo for 15 years. I often go out with my foreign friends so I can tell you nice places which are not in guide books! Also I often go out for dinner or lunch so please ask me if you want nice restaurants!
license:
Other reasons | 【マンスリー契約】最低30泊以上の一時使用賃貸借契約を結びます。
We will make a monthly room rent contract when a guest arrives. Minimum term is 30days.

name: WOMAN ONLY LICENSED ! Cosy & Cat behnd Shibuya
description:
female travellers here only.
Sorry no boys and COUPLE.

Long term stay
If you would like to stay here more than 1 month, 40% discount will be applied!
Please ask more detail. In case of long term stay, we allow only one person.

★★★　THIS ROOM IS FOR WOMEN ONLY　★★★

Hi My name is Wakana.

I am a female Japanese professional living with my daughter, a french cat & a british short hair cat in this beautiful 2 story house designed with fengshui concept.
Looking forward to meeting you!

The space
We offer quite and peaceful private 6 tatami room with walk in closet + makeup room with round table and chair with a shared bathroom in a spacious 83 square meter size house.
Many guests have said that the room was more specious than they expected.

Guest access
We can share bathroom , toilet and washing basin. I am afraid there is no availability for preparing evening meals but there a
neighborhood_overview: The location is walkable distance to famous Shimokitazawa, known to be a posh residential area without any high rise buildings. In just 10 minutes you can be at the heart of the trendy, funky, and bohemian Shimokitazawa that has a smorgasbord of affordable yet mouth-wateringly good restaurants and vintage clothes shops. The house is well situated in between train stations: 5 minutes walk to Ikenoue station on Inokashira line, 3rd stop from Shibuya station. 8 minutes walk to Shimokitazawa station on Odakyu line, 10 minutes from Shimokitazawa to Shinjuku by train. All very convenient!  Also, if you just feel like taking your sweet time to just enjoy the walk and see a beautiful scenery at the same time, there is a very beautiful garden road that will take you to Ikejiri ohashi station on Denentoshi line which is just a 20 minute walk from our home. Amazing park like atmosphere in Kichijoji is nearby too.
host_about:
Hi My name is Wakana and Japanese who speak English well.
I believe I am very friendly, kind and approachable person. 
I love meeting new people!

I love travelling inside and outside of Japan.  I love green plants, Flowers and nature.
I love eating out that's why I chosen Shimokitazawa to live! 
There are too many reasonable yet good restaurants here.
I used to live in Australia and South india altogether for 6 years!

If you want to share some time with me, I would be more than happy to meet in person and spend some time talking/eating/drinking with you when the time permit during your stay!

name: private room @Senju area
description:
Our house is new and clean
Big hub station Kitasenju,is walking distance and from there,you can go Ginza,Roppongi,Asakusa,Tsukiji ,Ueno,Tokyo sky tree directly.
Easy access to all major spot.

The space
One or two people will fit.
air conditioner and heater is inside.

Guest access
・your private room is on the second floor.

・buthroom,toilet are shared. Those are on 1st floor

・You　can use Shampoo, Treatment,Soap,Towel,hair dryer and refrigerator.

Other things to note
We have a small kid.
He may bother you.

License number
M130007760
neighborhood_overview:
There are shopping mall near Senjuohashi station.
supermarket,restaurants(Mcdonald's,Otoya,Chinese,Italian ) are 5min away.

Big hub station,Kitasenju is walking distance.15min by foot.
From Kitasenju,you can go Ginza,Roppongi,Tsukiji,Tokyo sky tree,even Nikko,Hakone directly.


Close to fish market.
you can enjoy fresh sashimi.

There are many Japanese pubric bath called ' SENTO' near my house.Everybody take a bath all naked.
host_about:
出身地 東京
好きなこと 旅行､ﾃﾆｽ

A host is the husband and wife who did round-the-world honeymoon. 
We have visited more than 50countries.
Let'stalk about travel.

name: Home stay with a Japanese language teacher family.
description:
★*:.★*:.  Must Read .:*★.:*★
*:.Maximum 5 adults and 2 small kids
*:.This includes accommodation and Japanese home cooking class. You can choose from Tempura , Kara-age, Takoyaki, Teuchi-Udon etc. The  cooking class is one time during your stay.
*:.When you "CONTACT HOST" or request, would you introduce all people of you.
*:.This room may save travel cost and time everyday.
*:. Free pocket Wi-Fi (Mobile Wi-Fi)

The space
★*:.★*:.  Must Read 2 .:*★.:*★
*:.Your private room is disinfected by Ozone generators  as a whole from things you can touch to the ceiling and air before check in .  There is two toilets in our house. Then you don't share toilet with us. We disinfect two toilets and a bathroom every time or always as much as possible. We use Ozone generators , Chlorine dioxide, Hypochlorous acid and Alcohol appropriately.  I think the efficacy is Ozone > Chlorine dioxide > Hypochlorous acid > Alcohol.   You can ask us stop using some
neighborhood_overview:
This area Shinjuku is most convenient town in Tokyo. You can buy almost goods, eat almost food, take much experience than other area.

Shinjuku have many No.1.

〈Trains 〉
Shinjuku station have 14 train lines. You can go many praces conveniently.
The number of Shinjuku station passengers is the most in the world, recorded in Guinness Book.

〈 Retail sales 〉
The 1st place Shinjuku Station east area 7 min walk
The 2nd place Ginza
The 3rd place Shinjuku Station west erea 15~20 min walk
it's most convenient shopping area here.

〈food service〉
The number of establishments in the lodging and food service in Shinjuku is No.1.

〈 foreigners 〉
The population of foreigners in Shinjuku is the most among Tokyo. Thanks to its convenient location, the city is chosen by foreigners the most.
host_about:
Hello!
We are Three-person family of a boy 11 years old, Mother Mari, and father Ken. 
We have host family experiences about 8 years.
Mari was born and raised in Shinjuku, so here is my hometown.

※Ken teaches Japanese to foreigners as a free volunteer. If you hope, Ken will also teach you.

name: Unique stay! New&1min to the subway
description:
The space
Lovely new maisonette just steps from Hiroo station (Hibiya line) that is next to Roppongi or Ebisu station.

This new house is just built by amazing architecture, Motoji Funatsu, consisting of a bed room, a lounge, a kitchen, a bathroom with a tab, a rooftop and a attic.

This house has an area of 60㎡ can comfortably accommodate 2 people. But I have extra "futon" and linens, so 3 people may be possible.

This house is equipped with everything needed (washing machine, TV, Play station 3 (DVD&Blu-ray), fridge, microwave with oven, washing machine, dishwasher, bamix, and cooking tools).

Please note that there will be sunlights in the morning in your bed room from the top of window which have't cover with curtain. It's one of intension of the architect.
It's better if you bring an eye mask if you worry about that.

You can use Wifi internet access in my house. I also have a portable wifi for you to
host_about:
My name is Yume which means dream in Japanese and my originally is Japan.

I am a landlord
amenities: bose sound bar Bluetooth sound system

name: SHIBUYA 7 MINS  AMAZING HOST（for woman only）
description:
Our house is located very nice area of Tokyo, called JIyugaoka, quite and decent neibourhood. Our big house is shared by my daughter's family under one roof but half of the house belongs to mine. We have separate kitchen, bathroom etc.
Notice for two woman only .

The space
Welcome to home travellers!!

Hello My name is Haruko and I live in Jijyugaoka for many years and I love this town very much. I love meeting new people as I am also frequent traveller myself.

REMARKS
We accept only female traveller or couple.
We will not accept if only guest who is a male.


About the house
============
The house is located very posh and leafy area of jiyugaoka,
approx 8 minutes walk through garden road that will be starting from Jiyugaoka station all the way.
After hectic tour in Tokyo I am sure that you can rest well at our place.

Jiyugaoka is very trendy & popular place for young people and
host_about:
My name is Haruko.  I love meeting new people and I am interested in foreign culture alot.  My hobby is cooking and collecting small zakka and decoration for the house. I can  speak Japanese and Korean and a little bit of  English (in case of English my daughter can help)
Please come and join my house!

name: Room in Mejiro/Ikebukuro (2 of 3)
description:
· 7-min walk from Mejiro Station on JR Yamanote line
· 15-min walk to Ikebukuro, a hub city in Tokyo
· Quiet and comfortable residential area with supermarkets, restaurants etc.
· This room suits 1 or 2 persons
· Non-smokers only please

The space
· Common areas include the kitchen/dining room, vanity sink, bath/shower room (hot shower), 2 toilets, and the laundry room. Guests may use the kitchen, refrigerator, dishes, washing machine etc. as needed.
· Free Wi-Fi access, in-room air conditioner units, shampoo and conditioner, body wash, and clean towels are all available to use.
· If you have a late flight on the day you check out, you may leave your suitcase in the front closet and pick it up later before you need to head to the airport.

Other things to note
· Only monthly contract available until March 2020 due to Japanese law
· No smoking and no pets please!
· Details about how to get to the hous
neighborhood_overview:
· An ideal neighborhood coveted even by locals! A quiet residential area nestled in the heart of Tokyo with quick and easy access to the JR Yamanote Line and major metropolitan centers and attractions. Perfect for travelers who want to immerse themselves in the chaos of the city by day and come home to a quiet home at night for rest.
· Plenty of cute side streets, parks, shops etc. to explore in the immediate area, if you don't feel like venturing too far. Guests often tell me about a restaurant or pub they've discovered close to the house that I didn't even know was there!
· Shinjuku, the biggest city in the Tokyo area, is 3 stops away on the Yamanote Line; Ikebukuro, another large, bustling city, is a short walk (10-15 mins) from the house.
· From Mejiro Station to my house is about a 7-minute walk. When you book your room, I will provide detailed instructions for getting to the house, both from Mejiro Station and from Haneda and Narita Airports. The instructions are c
host_about:
Hello, travelers!

I am a fun, easy-going Tokyo native who enjoys meeting people from all over the world and hearing about their lives, cultures, and experiences. My interests include languages, culture, literature, economics, exercise, cooking, and traveling. I have lived in Mejiro most of my life, so you’ll be staying with a true local.
I’m often outside the house for work or visiting friends and family, but whenever I’m home I look forward to hanging out and enjoying good conversation with my guests. I’ve met so many interesting people since I start hosting!

I have two daughters named Yuna (born in 2016) and Yuki (2019).

Any guests who don’t mind kids around are welcome!

I have three rooms available through Airbnb, so please check for all my listings if the first one you see doesn’t suit your schedule.
We hope you have a wonderful time in Japan!

name: Shinjuku Sharehouse Private Tatami room  8F
description:
9th floor has Entrance Living room, kichen and bath room and toilet


8th, 9th and 10th floor are connected by inner steps
3 toilet and 1 bathroom are sharing even though you have a private room
Of course, we provide Futon, blanket and pillow, towels, hairdryer ,tooth paste and Bed sheets

The space
For Aikido Honbu Dojo is very close from our space

For MMA fighters and Brazilian Jiujitsu practitioners we are centrally located in Tokyo. We are close to a wide array of gyms, such as:
- Hearts MMA - Carpe Diem - Tri Force - Isami MMA

Our place are SHARING ROOMS and PRIVATE ROOMS
which you could find out from our listings

Also you can enjoy roof top with drinks. could see nite view and even TOKYO SKY TREE tower as well.
we have a terrace for smoker with good view but not in the rooms please.

name: cute room, safty residential area in west-Tokyo
description:
The nearest downtown is Shibuya or Shinjuku or Kichijoji、each are far from 30min. by the private line. And the nearest station is Chitose-Karasuyama on Keio-line, 15min. walking to my house.

The capacity per １person. In particular, women guest is desirable.
I have 2 rooms, typeA(small,girly,No air-condition) and typeB(Large,simple,air-condition).

But I can lend only one room at a time. I live while doing other work of my own in this house. I 'll choose which room fits the customer.

The space
single room
This capacity is for one person.
In particular, It's desirable for women guest.

(typeA)small,sofa bed,cute for woman,manga,electlical fan or heater
(typeB)Large,single bed, plenty of storage,air-condition,hammock,for men.

Guest access
bathroom,kitchen,living(common)

About the passport of the guest: From June this year, a new law on housewives was enacted in Japan. Along with
neighborhood_overview: There are convinient store, big park, bus stop to the station near from our house.
host_about:
I was born in TOKYO and have been living in this house for a long time. 
My house will be completely cohabiting by host and guest.
And this house is in a quiet residential area.

My house is not traditional Japanese style, but small western style.
You can use either of the two rooms.
One is about 10 tatami in size and the other is 4 tatami mat size, there is a difference in room charge, so you can choose. Both of them have a capacity of one person.

I will introduce the location of our house.
It's 3min. by bus stop, (Website hidden by Airbnb) walk from the nearest station which is the private line, is 20min. from Shinjuku or Shibuya station.

You'll use  1 of 2 guest room(1bed,1shelf,1hanger lack), common shower room , common dining, living, wi-fi, yoga-mat, bath-towel, hair-dryer,shampoo.

I have the several works at my house. So you can have spare house key for go and back. 
As the first day you arrive at Narita airport or Haneda airport, I'd like to pick up you the nearest station by my car. So, pls.let know me the arriving time  before getting on airplaine.

My hobbies are watching movies, watching rugby, participating in art events, traveling.

Have a good time in West Tokyo!!

name: Enjoy a unique house in a green residential area!
description:
This is a solitary house , host living together. The unique house by the architect is flooring and bright. Guest Room is 14 square meter with a single bed, desk, chair, air conditioner, microwave, electrical pot, massager, and more.
Breakfast is served in the form of making together or tasting the meal of the host.
Please let us know in advance if you do not need it.

The space
This house was designed by an architect who likes airplanes. It is a well-ventilated and bright house, and there are many greens in the garden....

Guest access
In the common space there are kitchen with microwave oven and gas stove, bath, toilet, living room with TV and radio, shoe box, iron, yoga mat etc etc. In addition, there is a bicycle which guests can use in the garden.

About breakfast: It is not possible to provide a formal breakfast because it does not have permission from health center, but we can eat cooked food together with guest
neighborhood_overview:
From Shinjuku Station, get off at Chitose Karasuyama Station, one on the Keio Line, 14 min. on a limited express train, and 22 min. on each station. Shibuya, Kichijoji and Shimokitazawa are also nearby.
This neighborhood is a quiet residential area. There is a big park in the immediate neighborhood. There are convenience stores and supermarkets in residential areas. When you go to the nearest station, there is a big shopping area. The nearest areas convenient for going from the nearest station to shopping and drinking with friends are Shimokitazawa, Kichijoji, Shibuya, Shinjuku.

name: Home stay with a Japanese language teacher family
description:
★*:.★*:. Must Read .:*★.:*★
*:.Maximum 2 adults and 1 small kids. We will not accept 3 adults. We can prepare only 2 single-size mattresses or 1 single-size mattress +1 semi-double mattress .
*:.When you "CONTACT HOST" or request, would you introduce all people of you.
*:.This room may save travel cost and time everyday.
*:. Free pocket Wi-Fi (Mobile Wi-Fi)

The space
★*:.★*:. Must Read 2 .:*★.:*★
*:.Your private room is disinfected by Ozone generators  as a whole from things you can touch to the ceiling and air before check in .  There is two toilets in our house. Then you don't share toilet with us. We disinfect two toilets and a bathroom every time or always as much as possible. We use Ozone generators , Chlorine dioxide, Hypochlorous acid and Alcohol appropriately.  I think the efficacy is Ozone > Chlorine dioxide > Hypochlorous acid > Alcohol.   You can ask us stop using some of them. You can ask us use  Ozone generator everyday. Yo
host_about:
Hello!
We are Three-person family of a boy 11 years old, Mother Mari, and father Ken. 
We have host family experiences about 8 years.
Mari was born and raised in Shinjuku, so here is my hometown.

※Ken teaches Japanese to foreigners as a free volunteer. If you hope, Ken will also teach you.

name: share house 'Miraie' @JR Osaki
description:
台湾人の妻、2歳の娘と私の家族と、シェアハウス、ゲストハウスが１つになった一軒家です。ゲスト用に１部屋または2部屋提供しています。１部屋はダブルベッドのため、2人での宿泊も可能。共有の20畳のリビングとアイランドキッチン、屋上の大きなお風呂が魅力的です。

1F：3 bed room for guest & share mate. (& Shower, toilet, Laundry)
2F：Living & Kitchen.
3F：family room. (& Shower, toilet, Laundry)
roof：bath

JR大崎駅から徒歩10分弱。大崎駅は、品川駅まで１駅、羽田空港まで30分もかからない好立地。Miraieから徒歩5分で、昔ながらの商店街もあります。

The space
Meet and have a great share life experience with an international marriage family as well as a Japanese person during your stay in Japan.

What is Miraie?

The name of this share house "Miraie" translates to, "The future house." Miraie is more than just a home, it is the future living style that is very beneficial for society as well as socializing. Furthermore, Miraie is a very rare living style in Japan.

Who lives here?

Owner:
International married couple.
My wife is Taiwanese and is fluent in English, Japanese and Chinese
host_about: よろしくお願いします｡

name: Roppongi Villa,7min/ROPPONGIstatn.
description:
Your own super house in Azabu, the most sought after address in central Tokyo. 3min walk/ROPPONGI hills-Grand Hyatte, 7min walk/ROPPONGI stn,14min Bus ride to SHIBUYA. OMOTESANDO,HARAJUKU very close. 3000sqrft of beautifully designed Modern living space,4BDRs, Living/dinning, 2.5 bath, a porch. Sleeps up to 14 guests.Super Central location.HiSpeed FiberInternet/HOME WIFI. No sharing.

The space
Please check our other listings;-
MeijiHouse and HirooHouse.

ATTENTION GROUPS :- For the QUALITY OF ACCOMMODATION, AMPLE SPACE, AND GRAND LOCATION. we are absolutely confident that this is the best deal you can find on Airbnb-Tokyo. Make the residence your base to venture into this amazing city that has so much to offer. Now to the House.

This western style, Eco friendly , beautifully designed RC house has high ceilings,and large glass walls( brightly lit).
HOUSE FEATURES:
280m2, beautifully designed,well furnished living space, wi
neighborhood_overview:
Nishiazabu area is one of the most elegant residential/commercial/entertaining neighborhoods in Tokyo. Roppongi hills a 5 minute walk away is known by long time residents as "adults' Disney land". Resturants, bars, movie theaters,shops, a park etc , All packed in this beautifully designed complex.
7 minutes walk away from R.hills is another equally beautifully laid out shopping complex in "Tokyo MidTown". ROPPONGI itself boasts the largest art museum in Japan with the National art museum being in its vicinity.

The house itself is surrounded by embassies it's a safe/quiet neighborhood with a mini supermarket only a 2 minute walk away.
host_about:
We are long term residents of beautiful Japan and our team has been hosting guests for the last 7
 years, in our 3 high end units. We shall do our utmost to make your stay comfortable. Thank you for booking with us. 
 
Our units are very very centrally located, and we guarantee smooth checkin/out. 
Plus of  course city outings recommendations.

We are happy to meet or beat pricing on any comparable packages in the locations (Nishiazabu and hiroo),
Though we sincerely believe that it will be extremely difficult to find similar offerings.

We will provide the extra touch of meeting you upon arrival , and give you a guided tour to the property you book, in order to have a very smooth arrival/checkin. Also, flexible on checkin/out depending on the availability. 

Houses are family friendly, with lol children potential needs, (cribs, guard rails, high chair, etc ) available.

name: Stunning home in central Tokyo
description:
Help to make your stay in Tokyo unforgettable at surely one of the best homes available on Airbnb in the city. Five stories of stunning light-filled modern accommodation located in a tranquil setting just minutes away from the bustling and popular Azabu Juban neighbourhood in the centre of the city. The house was designed by a leading Japanese architect and has four bedrooms including a traditional Japanese tatami room, spacious open plan living-dining-kitchen and a rooftop garden.

The space
Help to make your stay in Tokyo unforgettable at surely one of the best homes available on Airbnb in the city. 5 stories of stunning light-filled modern accommodation located in a tranquil setting just minutes away from the charming Azabu Juban area.

The house was designed and built in 2008. We used a leading Japanese designer / architect Baqueratta. They have created a beautiful house full of light and with a feeling of space. It has 4 bedrooms and can accommodate
neighborhood_overview: With approaching 40 million in the greater Tokyo area this is the world's big daddy city and can be very confusing. Central Tokyo can be defined as lying within the Yamanote raliway line (an albeit much larger equivalent of Zone 1 London within the Circle Line or within the Peripherique in Paris). We are in the central Minato-ward, which is high end residential, home to many embassies, some of the city's best eating and drinking and key tourist attractions such as Tokyo Tower.  The house is in the Minami Azabu neighbourhood behind the South Korean embassy. The immediate surroundings of the house are very tranquil but the bustling and very popular Azabu Juban shopping street is just 5 mins walk away. This shopping street retains some old world charm while being located right next to Roppongi Hills and other large developments. Up the hill from the house you have the lovely Aruisagawa Park and there are also a number of nearby temples and shrines and the house is well located for Tokyo's
host_about:
The Dawson family (Richard, Junko, Alexander 12, Rika 8 and Ellie 5) look forward to welcoming you to the best city in the world and introducing you to some of our favourite places.

Originally from Edinburgh, Scotland, Richard has been living in Tokyo since 2001, and after a career with PwC left in 2013 to pursue a life-long dream of running a wine bar. After 5 years of 6AM finishes it was proving totally incompatible with family life so he now runs a wine delivery, retail and events business as well as managing a number of Airbnb rentals throughout the city. 

Meanwhile Junko is originally from the landlocked mountainous Nagano region, home to some of the country's best skiing and where bees are a speciality food delight.

Alexander, Rika and Ellie are available for play dates as required whenever they are free from school activities.
license: Hotels and Inns Business Act | 東京都港区 | 30港み生環き第58号

name: Blissful Retreat near Shinjuk, Koenji, Shimokita!
description:
This flat is one of 3 minimal Showa style apartments near Shinjuku. It is a small Studio type apartment 16㎡ plus a Loft space to sleep. You get Homewifi, compact Kitchen, Loft area, Bathroom, and Toilet in this apartment best for 3-4 people (up to 5 people). For 5th person, we can provide additional futon on the floor but this will take up floor space as it is a small apartment. To Shinjuku it is only 6mins ride in two stops from Daitabashi station which is nearest station from this apartment.

The space
This flat is small but clean studio unit with kitchen, bathroom & toilet, and AC. It has a great feeling of Showa Era located near Shinjuku (6 mins ride) and Shibuya (just over 15 mins) or walk 45 minutes or more. You can get to the Daitabashi Train station area in 4-5 mins just across the main road. The flat is located in a real Tokyo neighborhood friendly atmosphere. There is a fresh supermarket, Obento shops, and local cafes, restaurants around!
The apar
neighborhood_overview:
The neighbourhood is full of amenities supermarkets, many convenience stores, coin laundry on the corner, and a public SPA (sento bath) also on the corner!
There are little bars in the neighborhood to try, or more extensive nightlife is very close to Shinjuku or Shibuya. Omotesando is also nearby which is a great shopping area. The unit's area offers an easy trip to many museums and galleries around Tokyo.
host_about:
Hi 
My mission is to make a Oasis in Tokyo for the locals and Visitors. 
I was born and raised in Tokyo. I enjoy travelling both domestically and globally. I can give you good tips about travelling in Japan.  Recently, I am into renovation of houses and apartments, especially in the way that ecological and renewable energy is adopted into conventional house. In terms of hobby, I play sports. Rugby football (mostly Touch Rugby though) and Aikido mainly.  
I love outdoor activities. I go camping regularly to some islands off Pacific or Hokkaido in Japan. 
Awakened up for spiritual world since spring 2013. :D Started to yoga and meditation recently. This has been keeping me pretty energetic and clear.  
We have western rooms with beds and Japanese room with tatami with Futon mattress. 
I try to provide casual open welcoming atmosphere but comfortable clean rooms so that you will have a great memory of your visit. 

Importantly I try to protect the diminishing nature and make the urban environment greener and less hostile to all living by planting trees and seeds for flowers etc. I hope the concrete jungle Tokyo(and Japanese towns in general) will be more green and natural and welcoming for human habitation. This is what I put some energy. You will see the greenery around the premise.
neighbourhood: 杉並区, 東京都, Japan
license: Hotels and Inns Business Act | 東京都杉並区杉並保健所 | 30杉保衛環第331号

Awakened up for spiritual world since spring 2013. :D Started to yoga and meditation recently. This has been keeping me pretty energetic and clear.  
We have western rooms with beds and Japanese room with tatami with Futon mattress. 
I try to provide casual open welcoming atmosphere but comfortable clean rooms so that you will have a great memory of your visit. 

Importantly I try to protect the diminishing nature and make the urban environment greener and less hostile to all living by planting trees and seeds for flowers etc. I hope the concrete jungle Tokyo(and Japanese towns in general) will be more green and natural and welcoming for human habitation. This is what I put some energy. You will see the greenery around the premise.
neighbourhood: 杉並区, 東京都, Japan
license: Hotels and Inns Business Act | 東京都杉並区杉並保健所 | 30杉保衛環第331号

name: Spacious! Shibuya House w/Garden
description:
Our comfortable, bright, clean and warm house surrounded by green is located close to Shibuya, Harajuku, Omotesando and Shinjuku! We provide you with info on best restaurants, areas, history and entertainments that only locals know in Tokyo :D

The space
The house is located only 5 minutes walk away from Yoyogi-Uehara station (Odakyu Line and Chiyoda Subway Line). Yoyogi-Uehara is a quiet residential district well known for a beautiful neighborhood with lots of local restaurants, shops and bars.
Very easy access to Shibuya, Harajuku and Shinjuku area and Yoyogi-park (the biggest park in Tokyo, good for taking a walk or running.)

Train:
- 5mins walk from Yoyogiuehara station (Odakyu line/Chiyoda Subway line)
5mins train to Shinjuku station
6mins train to Harajuku station
7mins train to Omotesando station
10mins train to Shibuya station

Cozy and convenient area:
3mins walk to the nearest supermarket
host_about: こんにちは! We are offering the whole ground floor of our large two-story house in Shibuya/Harajuku, the area which is located in the center of Tokyo. We are looking forward to welcoming you! :D

name: BEST for 2ppl@Shinjuku Takadanobaba
description:
【マンスリー契約専用】For monthly use only!!
Renting a room less than one month without a license is illegal, I only rent out the room for a person who can stay over 30 days. We will make a room rent contract when you arrived.
You don't need to pay for any extra fee by making a contract.

The space
9mins from Takadanobaba station! Walkable from Shinjuku station even if you miss the last train. With a classy designed building, you can enjoy a neo-Tokyo stay.The house is 9 minutes from Takadanobaba station along Yamanote-line. From Takadanobaba, you can go to Shinjuku by 5 minutes, to Shibuya by 12 minutes!Even if you miss the last train, you can go back from Shinjuku on foot. (There are so many attractive night spots like bars or restaurants in Shinjuku.)Takadanobaba is really nice place to live. You can buy any groceries and also has many good restaurants. I usually eat out around there so if you want to know, please ask me!This one is one of my house but I also ma
host_about: I've been around center in Tokyo for 15 years. I often go out with my foreign friends so I can tell you nice places which are not in guide books! Also I often go out for dinner or lunch so please ask me if you want nice restaurants!
license: Other reasons | 【マンスリー契約】最低30泊以上の一時使用賃貸借契約を結びます。 We will make a monthly room rent contract when a guest arrives. Minimum term is 30days.
